qas.question: What year were the boundaries for the state-run tourism district finally set?
What were the three major things that the district would include?

answers.text: The district would include heavier police presence, as well as beautification and infrastructure improvements

qas.question: Who would oversee all functions of the new district?
Who would make the changes within the district to attract new businesses and attractions?
What two qualities were mentioned in regards to new construction?

answers.text: would be ambitious and may resort to eminent domain

context: On April 29, <a0_0>2011<a0_0/>, the boundaries for the state-run tourism district were set. <a1_0>The district would include heavier police presence, as well as beautification and infrastructure improvements<a1_0/>. <a2_0><a3_0>The CRDA<a3_0/><a2_0/> would oversee all functions of the district and will make changes to attract new businesses and attractions. New construction <a4_0>would be ambitious and may resort to eminent domain<a4_0/>.
